{{Infobox command
|name=op
|oplevel=
* 3 {{only|java|short=1}}
* 2 {{only|bedrock|short=1}}

}}

Grants [[operator]] status to the player(s).

{{IN|java}}, adds the players into the [[ops.json format|ops.json]] file with the default op permission level specified by <code>op-permission-level</code> in the [[server.properties]].

{{IN|bedrock}}, changes the player's permission in the "Player Permission" screen to the "Operator" option . In [[BDS|dedicated servers]], it is also recorded in <samp>permissions.json</samp>. The <samp>permissions.json</samp> file can be reloaded with {{cmd|permission}} command.

==Syntax==

* '''Java Edition'''
:<code>op <targets></code>

* '''Bedrock Edition'''
:<code>op <player: target></code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|targets|game_profile|player: target|CommandSelector<Player>}}
: Specifies the player to be granted op.
: {{IN|java}}:
:: {{arg desc|je=game_profile}}
: {{IN|bedrock}}:
:: {{arg desc|be=player}}
